content.heading: Doorlock Management System
content.description: Provide Backend core service APIs for the IoT system of Ho Chi Minh City University of Education

content.scope: Create HTTP API for client apps to control doors in university. Set up communication between BE server with Raspberry gateway via MQTT protocol/APIs.Store/retrieve data, logs and schedulers of doors/gateways.
